statements: SELECT * FROM protein_structures;
SELECT id, pdb_id, resolution, structure FROM protein_structures ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT pdb_id, structure FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution < 2.0;
SELECT DISTINCT pdb_id FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution >= 2.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution > 2.0 ORDER BY pdb_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT pdb_id, structure FROM protein_structures WHERE id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, resolution FROM protein_structures WHERE pdb_id LIKE '2A%' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM protein_structures ORDER BY resolution ASC, pdb_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT pdb_id FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution < 1.5 ORDER BY pdb_id
SELECT * FROM crystallographic_data ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT protein_id, structure FROM crystallographic_data WHERE resolution < 2.0;
SELECT structure, resolution, publication_date FROM crystallographic_data WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crystallographic_data WHERE resolution > 2.0 ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, institution DESC;
SELECT protein_id, structure FROM crystallographic_data WHERE resolution BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.0;
SELECT * FROM crystallographic_data JOIN researchers ON crystallographic_data.protein_id = researchers.researcher_id WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crystallographic_data;
SELECT protein_name, resolution FROM crystallographic_data WHERE resolution < 3.0;
SELECT structure_id, structure_type FROM crystallographic_data ORDER BY structure_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE organization = 'University XYZ';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researcher WHERE researcher_id = 101;
SELECT structure_id, protein_name, resolution FROM crystallographic_data;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE organization='University';
SELECT structure_id_1, structure_id_2, similarity_score FROM comparison_results ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT publication_date, resolution FROM crystallographic_data WHERE structure_type='X-ray';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researcher WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CrystallographicData;
SELECT structure_name, resolution FROM CrystallographicData WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM Researcher ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researcher WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT c.comparison_id, e.date, c.comparison_result FROM Comparison c JOIN Experiment e ON c.experiment_id = e.experiment_id ORDER BY e.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CrystallographicData
SELECT protein_id, structure_name, resolution FROM CrystallographicData WHERE resolution > 2.0
SELECT full_name, email FROM Researcher ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT c.structure_name, r.full_name, e.date FROM CrystallographicData c INNER JOIN Experiment e ON c.protein_id = e.protein_id INNER JOIN Researcher r ON e.researcher_id = r.researcher_id

SELECT r.full_name AS Researcher, c.structure_name AS Structure, e.methodology AS Method FROM Researcher r, CrystallographicData c, Experiment e WHERE r.researcher_id = e.researcher_id AND c.protein_id = e.protein_id
SELECT * FROM protein_structures;
SELECT structure_name, resolution, num_atoms FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE method = 'X-ray crystallography';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM protein_structures WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT structure_name, num_atoms FROM protein_structures ORDER BY num_atoms DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE method = 'X-ray Crystallography' AND resolution < 3.0;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
